data.name: Dakar 18 - Desafío Ruta 40 Rally
data.detailed_description:
The Desafío Ruta 40 Rally is part of the world-famous Dakar Series, a number of cross-country rallies, and is the first event of this series to be added to Dakar 18. The race took place between August 27th and 31st in Argentina, and it covers the following stages and respective roadbooks:

• Stage 1: SAN MIGUEL - BELÉN
• Stage 2: BELÉN - TINOGASTA
• Stage 3: TINOGASTA - TINOGASTA
• Stage 4: TINOGASTA - VILLA UNION
• Stage 5: VILLA UNION - SAN JUAN

It also includes a tribute to the bike rider Mathias Bellino, from HRC.

data.short_description: The Desafío Ruta 40 Rally is part of the world-famous Dakar Series, a number of cross-country rallies, and is the first event of this series to be added to Dakar 18. The race took place between August 27th and 31st in Argentina.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400s @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX-6100 @ 3.3 GHz or equivalent Core i3-7340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD HD 7870 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690k @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) or better
